Weapon.Name: Galactic Pulse Rifle
Weapon.Description: This rifle, equipped with an AI targeting system, was salvaged from the armory of the alien spacecraft. It hums with an otherworldly energy.
Weapon.WeaponCapabilities: The rifle's shots can penetrate multiple enemies
Weapon.NarrativeLine: As you pull the trigger, a beam of concentrated energy blasts through the horde.

Weapon.Name: Plasma Blade
Weapon.Description: A sword with a blade made of pure plasma energy. It vibrates intensely when close to enemies.
Weapon.WeaponCapabilities: Ignites enemies with a plasma field
Weapon.NarrativeLine: With a swift motion, you swing the blade, engulfing the enemy in flames.

Weapon.Name: Quantum Disruptor
Weapon.Description: A handheld device that can disrupt the fabric of space-time around a target, used by advanced alien assassins.
Weapon.WeaponCapabilities: Can displace enemies to a different location
Weapon.NarrativeLine: The air shimmers as the enemy vanishes, only to reappear in chaos.
